name: Computer Virus Simulator
summary:
Important: This game is not an actual computer virus. It is a normal video game.

Computer Virus Simulator is a computer virus simulation game. Players can safely experience simulated computer viruses. Experience a variety of malware, from standard to unique, safely. This game can be operated like a real PC. The player can also create computer viruses for the game and play with those created by other players.

This game can safely make the experience as realistic as a real computer virus. It has almost everything you would find in a real computer virus: tons of error dialogs, error marks, warning sounds, and beeps. The dialog behaves just like a real PC. The game offers a large number of computer viruses. Players are also free to create their own computer viruses for the game or play with viruses created by other players.
